tools.name: CUTS

tools.detailed_description: A framework combining deep learning and topology for multigranular unsupervised medical image segmentation.

tools.name: SelfReg-UNet

tools.name: DLTK

tools.detailed_description: A toolkit providing deep learning models, IO, and preprocessing utilities specifically for medical image analysis.

tools.name: DLTK Model Zoo

tools.detailed_description: A model zoo containing pretrained models and examples for the Deep Learning Toolkit (DLTK).

tools.name: NanoNet

tools.name: UNet-CRF-RNN

tools.name: FAST
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance framework for medical image processing and visualization
tools.detailed_description: A cross-platform C++ framework (with Python bindings) for high-performance medical image processing, neural network inference, and real-time visualization.

tools.name: ACPL

tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the ACPL method for semi-supervised medical image classification, utilizing anti-curriculum pseudo-labelling to leverage unlabeled data effectively.

tools.name: Mobile-U-ViT
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient medical image segmentation using U-shaped ViT

tools.detailed_description: A robust tool for segmenting and labeling vertebrae, intervertebral discs, spinal cord, and spinal canal in MRI images, utilizing nnU-Net and iterative algorithms.

tools.name: nitrain
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient medical image training framework
tools.detailed_description: A framework designed to efficiently train AI models on medical images, supporting various backends and optimizing the training pipeline.

tools.name: DDR-dataset
tools.one_line_profile: Diabetic Retinopathy dataset for classification and segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A high-quality dataset resource for diabetic retinopathy classification, lesion segmentation, and detection, facilitating algorithm development and benchmarking.

tools.name: SAM-Med3D
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient 3D model for promptable volumetric medical image segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A 3D adaptation of the Segment Anything Model (SAM) designed for efficient, promptable volumetric medical image segmentation.

tools.name: image2image-baseline-model
tools.one_line_profile: Baseline models for medical image reconstruction and translation
tools.detailed_description: A collection of PyTorch implementations of baseline models (UNet, GANs) for medical image reconstruction and image-to-image translation tasks.

tools.name: Attention-Gated-Networks
tools.one_line_profile: Attention Gate implementation for medical image analysis
tools.detailed_description: The official implementation of Attention Gates in Convolutional Neural Networks, widely used as a reference tool for improving medical image classification and segmentation performance.

tools.name: medicaltorch
tools.one_line_profile: Medical imaging framework for PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive framework for medical imaging in PyTorch, providing data loaders, processors, and utilities to streamline deep learning workflows.

tools.name: MultiPlanarUNet
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-Planar UNet for autonomous 3D segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A tool implementing the Multi-Planar UNet architecture for autonomous and robust segmentation of 3D medical images.

tools.name: pycad-model-zoo
tools.one_line_profile: Model zoo containing trained nnUNet models for body part segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A repository providing a collection of pre-trained models based on nnUNet architecture, specifically designed for segmenting various body parts in medical images.

tools.name: BraTS2018-tumor-segmentation
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of DeepMedic and 3D UNet for brain tumor segmentation
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based solver providing implementations of DeepMedic and 3D UNet architectures for brain tumor segmentation, specifically tailored for the BraTS 2018 challenge data.

tools.name: ITK-SNAP
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive software for medical image segmentation and visualization
tools.detailed_description: A software application used to segment structures in 3D medical images. It provides semi-automatic segmentation using active contour methods and manual delineation tools.

tools.name: SAM-VMNet
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for coronary artery segmentation and stenosis detection
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning solver for coronary artery segmentation and quantitative stenosis detection in angiographic images.

tools.name: Medical-Detection3d-Toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Landmark detection engine for 3D medical images
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit designed for landmark detection in 3D medical images, providing engines and models for anatomical structure localization.

tools.name: liver-SALSA
tools.one_line_profile: System for Automatic liver Lesion Segmentation and Detection
tools.detailed_description: A system (SALSA) designed for the automatic segmentation and detection of liver lesions in medical images.

tools.name: RADTorch

tools.detailed_description: A machine learning framework specifically tailored for medical imaging tasks, built on top of PyTorch to streamline radiology workflows.

tools.name: loTeNet_pytorch

tools.detailed_description: PyTorch implementation of Tensor Networks (loTeNet) for medical image classification tasks.

tools.name: BCDU-Net

tools.detailed_description: Implementation of BCDU-Net, a deep learning architecture combining U-Net with Bi-Directional ConvLSTM for medical image segmentation.

tools.name: VIBESegmentator
tools.one_line_profile: Full Torso Segmentation for VIBE Body Images

tools.name: AUGMENTATION_GAN
tools.one_line_profile: GAN-based Synthetic Medical Image Augmentation

tools.name: CADLab

tools.name: CellMix

tools.detailed_description: A general instance relationship-based method for data augmentation specifically targeted at pathology image analysis.

tools.name: DiffMIC

tools.name: pytorch_3D_medical_classification

tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based application framework/template designed to facilitate 3D classification tasks using medical images.

tools.name: 3D_Swin_transformer_classification

tools.detailed_description: A tool implementing the Swin Transformer architecture adapted for 3D medical image classification tasks.

tools.name: AgileFormer

tools.name: DL4ETI

tools.name: ild-cnn

tools.detailed_description: A Deep Convolutional Neural Network implementation for classifying lung patterns in Interstitial Lung Diseases (ILD).

tools.name: brats-deepmedic

tools.detailed_description: A framework adapting the Segment Anything Model (SAM) for 3D volumetric medical imaging, supporting prompt-based segmentation.

tools.name: STU-Net
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale pre-trained medical image segmentation model

tools.name: OCR-for-Medical-Laboratory-Reports

tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based pipeline for detecting and recognizing text in medical laboratory report images, facilitating data digitization.

tools.name: CBIM-Medical-Image-Segmentation

tools.detailed_description: A structured PyTorch framework providing implementations of various segmentation models and training pipelines for medical imaging.

tools.name: Patho-GAN
tools.one_line_profile: GAN-based framework for explainable diabetic retinopathy detection and retinal image generation
tools.detailed_description: Patho-GAN is a deep learning framework designed for diabetic retinopathy (DR) analysis. It utilizes Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) to synthesize high-quality retinal images for data augmentation, addressing class imbalance in medical datasets. Additionally, it includes an explainable classification module for detecting DR severity, providing visual interpretations of the diagnosis.
